Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it would be an excellent fit for you. We're offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $14500, reflecting its high quality and unique features. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
